display_long_description:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

[media]

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

[media]

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

[media]

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

[media]

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

[media]

**Talk to the Devs and join our community on Discord**:  https://discord.gg/cK4aG9sp8f
display_long_description_unprocessed:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618274_651211461159970_363128261145746290_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PXXhXVJXhmMQ7kNvwF_fu9l&_nc_oc=AdkQSS8Cvb3IA-eWB8gRbhYY6A4ROdUBGzPDvCsGfYZl51a5WrgmpGYIYcRktDJs7aY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5k3b9Va9p0F4USw5IoqFJg&oh=00_AfroOkNIXwOgpbmfRJAG2ao7sThdwVqd2QGrG4IJfXtSrw&oe=695E5416)

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491828038_841072975026277_681659773377307198_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ivkBBm7uf-gQ7kNvwGq0jTS&_nc_oc=Adns9JaAURRUPIT6kpwZvmZM2c5apjcvrJuPIcDsihs1huFJZhACv6fhoiWWG-Wqc3k&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5k3b9Va9p0F4USw5IoqFJg&oh=00_AfpmYFWK8xfrDT8NleZyobzI0pIjI02ZUOCBKiAVhoSliw&oe=695E54C5)

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825050_1360261182487425_1701726842792685932_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=AknJndTr-5AQ7kNvwF2TVrc&_nc_oc=AdmBIt_XaMlr_zAgOWGk9uDccdSf1pvF4TaNTA32SS6pB5BQQ9f0tmU87xFhlubBjKE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5k3b9Va9p0F4USw5IoqFJg&oh=00_AfpV9itDk-adRTPos-SaIcCvgOc5eeqoPmuZeMnC-iZyQg&oe=695E5EF1)

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499303585_2027694071311803_6829180901132345132_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-1vjCHCuMqYQ7kNvwFoYWNJ&_nc_oc=Adl2y1GKSEikcgBg6ZgjePsV0zoD3_ajfzVJ2YwncoZb9FBJ16_VTzUZb5AR8JkrrM8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5k3b9Va9p0F4USw5IoqFJg&oh=00_Afo6-K5Wqdq0jh3QsGDNKGqSUuQwPU409Xsyhn9an35XCQ&oe=695E4A23)

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822924_4109581859309473_406554525783631080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=3Jbi5_HQdWoQ7kNvwExlbUM&_nc_oc=Adlda45PusA85hUZrZK_09hw4bDNCobgYUvastUsP7oHuLHdMTEmRs7m4r95TyQ16v8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5k3b9Va9p0F4USw5IoqFJg&oh=00_AfqnYS_tbxYEuK294viXOP8_2JpQuJPJPTquoEnlXo1Yig&oe=695E5FEA)
